mlflex.helper
Class MiscUtilities

java.lang.Object
  mlflex.helper.MiscUtilities

public class MiscUtilities
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains general-purpose helper methods that are used in various places throughout the code. It also contains Singleton objects (those that are instantiated only once and stored as static variables).

Author:
Stephen

DeleteCoreDirectory

public static void DeleteCoreDirectory(java.lang.String directoryPath)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
Deletes all files and directories recursively from a "core" directory...a directory that contains key files that are created in the process of executing an experiment and that contains subdirectories specific to the iteration number.

Parameters:
directoryPath - Absolute path to the iteration directory

java.lang.Exception

name - Name to be formatted
Returns:
Formatted name

SeparateWords

public static java.lang.String SeparateWords(java.lang.String text)
If you have a string that has words that are each capitalized but are scrunched together without spaces between them, this method adds a space between each word.

Parameters:
text - Text that may need to be separated
Returns:
Modified text

UnformatName

public static java.lang.String UnformatName(java.lang.String name)
Some external libraries do not work well with special characters. After a name has been formatted, this method changes the characters back to the original characters.

Parameters:
name - Name to be unformatted
Returns:
Unformatted name

UnformatNames

public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> UnformatNames(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> names)
Some external libraries do not work well with special characters. After a name has been formatted, this method changes the characters back to the original characters.

Parameters:
names - List of names to be unformatted
Returns:
Unformatted names
